jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
Wee turns the light on and surprises Pim
An abrupt flashback may startles some viewers
Pim opens her eyes in bed and sees a corpse lying beside her. [Video]
Pim looks in the mirror and her reflection changes into the ghost of Ploy. [Video]
During a dream Pim turns around and blood is dripping from her eyes
Pim looks up and the ghost of Ploy is hanging from the fan
While in the bath, a hand grabs Pim and pulls her under the water
Pim suddenly drops the torch and the torchlight reveals someone sitting in a chair
Pim turns and the torch shines on a ghost with a demonic face. [Video]
Something lands on the bed while Wee is crawling underneath it
Pim is grabbed through a sheet
Pim suddenly sees the ghost of Ploy underneath the sheet. [Video]
Pim moves some coat-hangers in her wardrobe to reveal a ghostly face
Pim sees Ploy’s ghost in the back seat of the car
Pim see Ploy’s face in the reflection of a window
Pim hugs Wee however when she looks again he has transformed into Ploy
Pim’s mother grabs Wee
Wee is hit on the head by a glass object
A body falls out in front of Wee
Ploy appears in front of the crawling Wee
Wee’s face suddenly transforms into Pim’s ghost
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
Samuel jumps out and grabs his daughter (as a joke)
A sudden cut to Samuel banging on a car wheel with a tire iron may startle some viewers
A broken doll falls to the ground
Samuel grabs Janice’s hand as she goes to open a door
A shutter slides back up startling Sister Charlotte
Linda sees the doll which, accompanied by a loud noise, suddenly disappears into the darkness
The demon suddenly appears inside the tent and puts her hand on the face of one of the girls
The girl at the window turns around to reveal a demonic face
After several seconds silence, Janice is suddenly pulled off her chair into the air by an unseen force
Janice falls back to the ground
The toy gun is suddenly pulled out of Linda’s hand
Janice’s wheelchair is hit by an unseen force
Janice’s wheelchair is flung away from Janice’s outstretched hand
Bee suddenly begins crawling towards Janice
Hands come out of the well and pull Linda into it
Linda is suddenly pulled across the ground
After the scarecrow disappears, Kate suddenly bangs on the truck door scaring the girls inside
There is a loud bang on the door as Linda tries to open the window
After several seconds of silence, a hand comes from off screen to break the lightbulb beside Carol
There are several loud bangs on the door
Esther’s torso suddenly comes to life and chases after Linda
Janice suddenly bursts into the room where Linda is hiding
Annabelle suddenly appears at the door to her parents bedroom
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
The sticky hand hits the wall
The door is pushed open
The booth door blows open after the lights flicker
After a tense scene a girl walks by laughing
While Oliver is holding the camera up, the skeleton face growls loudly
The lightbulbs start to break
The table starts to move
A chair moves when she says “Hello
There is a jump cut back to Larry attacking Byron
The closet door is pushed open
There is a loud crunch as Larry is seen in the reflection of the window
The hand in the screen cracks before Larry attacks
Larry appears in the window and growls
Larry drops down to the floor
Larry charges out of the grass
Courtney’s phone makes a high pitched screaming noise
The sound of the shower curtain being pulled back during a tense scene may startle some viewers
An unseen force suddenly flings Courtney into the air
The figure in the hospital mirror suddenly rushes forward and the mirror cracks
Courtney’s head suddenly turns and a sound effect plays
As the countdown timer reaches zero, Evan falls onto the stairs
Quinn closes the laptop screen and briefly sees an apparition of demonic Evan in front of her
A hand suddenly appears on the car window startling Quinn
As Quinn looks again in the reversing camera, ghastly hands suddenly cover her eyes
A demonic boy hisses and throws himself at Matt
A man puts his hand on Matt’s shoulder
A ghastly hand pulls Quinn under the covers
The entire bed is suddenly flung into the air as Jordan hides from the demon
Jordan looks around and the demon screams “Where is she?”
As Matt says “We did it, they let me go” he is suddenly hit by a car
As Jordan looks at the countdown timer, the demon suddenly rushes towards her
The demon attacks Jordan from behind
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
A bear roars suddenly
A woman’s face flashes in front of Sarchie’s view from night vision goggles
A cat meows unexpectedly
A mousetrap snaps shut
A dead body falls out of the wall behind Sarchie
Dog begins to bark as a police team enter a bedroom
A bloodied head pops up on security camera footage
A man jumps out and grabs Sarchie from behind
Sarchie sees bloodied head man climbing over his daughters bed in the mirror
A hooded man appears in elevator
The hooded man is shown above Sarchie crawling along pipes
A man jumps out of a chest and puts Sarchie in a headlock
A clown pops out of a jack in the box
A dead body lands on Sarchie’s windscreen
Santino hisses at Sarchie
Santino’s head snaps back during the exorcism
A man appears behind Mark
As Mark speaks into his walkie-talkie, an unconscious man suddenly rears up and grabs Mark
A barking dog suddenly lunges at the car window
The sound of glass breaking during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
As the camera pans around Michelle, a ghostly face appears behind her
A door slams
A bird flies out of a dark room
Bryan sees the ghostly image of a boy standing in front of an open door
Hands shoot out from underneath a bed that Sam is standing in front of
Jules briefly glimpses a woman climbing the stairs
Michelle turns around and the face of a demonic woman suddenly appears in front of her
Jules is suddenly pulled backwards by an unseen force
John has a vision of his mother who suddenly transforms into the demonic woman
Bryan turns around to show his eyes are now black and his mouth full of a dark liquid
John turns around and is attacked by Bryan
Bryan suddenly opens his eyes and attacks an officer
A large number of birds burst out of John’s mouth
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
A figure runs past the screen
The tied up girl suddenly becomes possessed and begins to yell. [Video]
A girl’s possessed face flashes briefly on the screen
As she is driving, Mia sees a girl standing in the middle of the road
The girl rises up out of the water behind Mia
Mia turns around suddenly as David begins to talk to her
Mia sees the demonic girl in the mirror
There is a quick cut to Mia attacking the dog with a hammer
Mia starts to scream as the door bursts open and wind gushes in
Mia grabs Olivia’s arm as she tries to get the gun
Olivia sees a demonic version of her reflection and the mirror breaks
A loud noise coming from the cellar startles Natalie
Natalie is dragged back into the cellar
A loud crash startles David while he is in the cellar
Mia suddenly appears and attacks David with a knife
David stops to look at a photo. Possessed Eric appears behind him and stabs him in the neck. [Video]
A hand comes out of the earth and grabs Mia. [Video]
The abomination appears at the driver-side window of the car and breaks through the glass
The abomination appears in front of Mia
A knife comes through the wall just in front of Mia
A distressed woman appears on screen
Bright lights flash accompanied by loud sound effects
The telephone booth crashes down behind the shop attendant
April walks backwards into a masked man holding an axe
The lights turn off suddenly
The fuse box sparks
Loud banging can be heard from upstairs
A flash of lightning illuminates an alien outside walking towards the house
Lex is suddenly lifted into the alien ship
On some camera footage, a girl is suddenly abducted into the alien ship
A woman bursts out of a closet
Travis grabs Seth and puts a knife to his neck
An alien silhouette appears behind Travis
Travis, who is hiding underneath a bed, sees some alien feet
An alien hand grabs Travis around the face
A bang can be heard from the other side of the door
April looks through the peep hole in the door and sees an alien eye
A loud noise startles the sheriff
An alien runs quickly past the sheriff
The sheriff turns the car lights on to reveal an alien standing in front of the car
April appears by the car window beside Seth
There is a loud noise and a red light illuminates the room
After a momentary silence there is a loud noise and flashing blue lights
The floor boards begin to break up
Seth is attacked by an alien
Kyle approaches a mirror, suddenly an alien hand bursts through and grabs him
Something sparks near April
The power suddenly comes back on
The probe device suddenly opens
The alien/human hybrid opens its eyes
Sophia sees Courtney on the other side of the elevator
Courtney quickly opens the shower curtain during a tense scene
A coprse appears in the bathtub from under the shower curtain
A hand appears on the window of the wrecked car that Courtney is looking through
A few short cuts to the car crash may startle some viewers
Jamie’s girlfriend appears behind him briefly before the phone rings
Loud static comes out of the radio
Courtney tries to leave down the fire escape but Tessa appears in front of her
While swimming, Marlo has a flashback to her “flatlining” experience where she is floating face down in the water
Marlo looks up and sees the word “MURDERER” written on the morgue cabinet
A corpse appears behind Marlo
The radio crackles into life
All the cabinets on Jamie’s boat suddenly open
Jamie sees his ex-girlfriend
A hand reaches out and touches Jamie’s shoulder
Jamie is stabbed in the hand as he tries to climb out of the water
As the elevator door begins to close, Sophia briefly sees the girl from her class
Marlo is suddenly suffocated with a plastic bag
The corpse suddenly grabs Marlo around the throat
Marlo is suddenly lifted in the air and thrown backwards by an unseen force
The cat lunges at the screen and hisses

A startling image of some disfigured faces flashes up on the screen
As Laura backs away from the mirror, a demonic face appears beside her
A sketch of Laura’s face is pulled away from the camera suddenly to reveal a disheveled looking Marina
Gustavo looks down and sees the two disfigured faces from Marina’s Facebook page
A hand grabs Gustavo and the screen goes black
Gustavo runs past the camera
A close up of some eyes suddenly appears on the computer screen
A demonic face appears at the door as Kobe runs towards it
A door slams shut
The corpse like figure on the bed sits up
The person in the bathtub looks at Isabel
Olivia looks up from the paper and sees a girl slitting her throat
A phone rings during a tense scene
Olivia looks through a peephole and sees the demonic girl’s face
A body falls on Tyler’s car
A man is suddenly attacked by Olivia
As Kobe backs away from the demon girl he bumps into Laura
Kobe stabs Laura
Laura turns around and the demonic girl rushes at her
The doors burst open
A squirrel falls into the fireplace
Jump cut to some knocking
A ghost boy appears directly in front of the scope

It is revealed to be a ghost woman standing at the desk

The boy appears in the water and then a moment later behind the soldier
The ghost woman appears and screams

After opening a secret cupboard, a doll pops out startling Beth and Vera
Accompanied by a sound effect, we see the candy truck’s lights in the distance
A large man suddenly runs at Pauline while she is on the phone
As Beth attempts to get up, the door is suddenly slammed in her face
A bloodied hand appears on the door handle
A screaming Vera bursts through the door and tackles Beth
Beth turns to see a doll watching her in the hallway
The doll starts laughing maniacally and Beth suddenly wakes from a nightmare
As Beth looks through the keyhole, a figure suddenly appears in front of it
A screaming Vera runs out of the room
Someone bangs on the door grate from the other side as Beth tries to talk to her sister
Beth turns to see the fat man walk past her in the hallway
Beth says “Mom?” before she is attacked from behind
After opening the door to the cupboard slowly, the mysterious woman rushes at Beth
There is a bang on the door as Beth tries to open it
The fat man grabs Beth
As Beth listens by the door, a hammer comes crashing through from the other side
The doll starts laughing beside Beth who is hiding in a closet
During a tense scene the doll starts laughing once more
A man is suddenly shot
As Beth runs towards Vera she suddenly finds herself back in reality as she crashes through a mirror
The police officer lying on the ground suddenly gasps
In the distance someone shouts ‘Hawkins’, accompanied by a sound cue
Police officers searching the house get startled by each other
Michael suddenly runs in from the right and attacks the police officer
A hand suddenly smashes the lightbulb in the bathroom
A hand smashes through a window and grabs the old man by the head
Michael stabs a lady in the neck with a fluorescent lightbulb
A person in the back seat starts moving and Vanessa screams
The house front door slams shut
The girl on the floor comes alive and screams
A bloody mask lands on the car windshield
A bullet hits the car window,
A hand reaches down from on top of the car and grabs Marion
Marcus tries to leave the car but is pushed back in by Michael
Michael stabs Marcus in the eye
While being shot at by Vanessa, Michael pushes open the car door which hits Vanessa’s gun, causing her to shoot herself
After a quiet and intense scene, a hospital door is opened loudly
Michael appears behind Big John and stabs him in the armpit
A gunshot is heard from inside the house
Michael storms out of the closet
Michael comes back to life and stabs the police officer
Michael suddenly appears behind Karen
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
An actor for the horror maze jumps out at the girls
Another actor jumps out from behind them
Another actor jumps out from the blue curtains to the left side of the corridor
A robot witch comes out from the wall
A robot jester comes out from the wall
One of the park actors scares Natalie with a chainsaw while she’s talking to Gavin
An actor dressed as a clown jumps in front of Natalie and Gavin while they’re walking
The actor standing still turns and screams at Taylor
A cloaked actor jumps in front of group
Brooke turns around to leave and runs into Quinn
A mechanical spider drops down from the ceiling in front of Brooke and Quinn
The dead man Ash is looking inside assuming it was a prop suddenly grabs him
One of the actors grabs Taylor and lifts her up
Lights suddenly turn on above the doctor sitting on the chair and he turns to look at the group
The woman on the mattress grabs Ash as he is reaching for the syringe
A hand grabs Brooke from above the fog
One of the hands touches Taylor, frightening her
The lights of a train suddenly turn on behind Ash and Quinn and its horn goes off
The killer bangs on the glass
A light turns on in front of Ash and there is a cut to a growling gargoyle
The killer suddenly opens his eyes as Ash shines the flashlight on him
One of the park actors growls and runs at the group

As Natalie is drying her hair, the camera cuts to the empty bathroom stalls. It then cuts back to Natalie drying her hair and when it cuts to the stalls again the killer is standing right in front of her
The killer’s hand slowly reaches for Natalie’s hair and then suddenly pulls down accompanied by a loud thud sound
A mechanical prop springs out of the box after Brooke says “He’s not in here.
There is a sudden growl
A prop appears on the wall, frightening Brooke. The same prop appears on two more walls as she runs through the hall
The killer’s axe suddenly slashes through the wall
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
A sound effect plays during a tense scene (although nothing scary happens on screen)
Wade startles Carly from behind and a sound effect plays
Carly suddenly falls down a bank and into a pit
Wade bends down to touch what he thinks is a wax dog sculpture but it turns out to be a real dog that barks at him before running away
Carly cleans the mirror and in the reflection sees a man watching her
Carly hears a knocking noise and turns around to see the deformed wax figure of a housekeeper standing right in front of her
Carly turns the headlights on to reveal Bo standing in front of the car
Carly breaks an arm off one of the wax figures
Bo grabs Carly
A wax figure appears at the window startling Nick;
Paige turns the light on to reveal Vincent looming over her
Paige is stabbed in the foot as a blade comes up through the metal grate she is walking across
Vincent opens the car door
Vincent throws a spike at Paige
Nick grabs Carly as she walks up the stairs
A knife blade comes through the wall near Carly
There is a slight scare when a walkie talkie makes a loud noise as Georgie descends the stairs to the basement
There is another minor scare as we see Pennywise’s eyes appear at the drain grill in front of Georgie
There is a loud bang on a door as Mike takes out some rubbish
After a rather intense scene, Mike is almost run over by Henry’s car
The distorted woman from the painting appears in front of Stan
In the library basement, Ben is running away from a headless man when Pennywise suddenly appears in front of him and shouts “Egg Boy”
Ben is jumped by Patrick as he leaves the library (this is a very minor jump scare)
Patrick enters the sewerage system and uses an aerosol can and lighter flamethrower style as he hunts for Ben, suddenly he sees various dead children standing in front of him
Patrick sees a balloon in front of him and it pops to reveal Pennywise standing there
The hair from the drain suddenly winds itself around Beverly’s wrist
In the kitchen, Georgie rushes past the screen in the foreground as Bill looks on
Bill sees Georgie in the flooded basement, he slowly begins to decay and suddenly Pennywise rushes through the water towards Bill

The children are in Bill’s garage looking at various slides on a projector screen that suddenly begins to take on a life of its own. Pennywise appears on the projector screen and the kids panic and attempt to turn the projector off. Suddenly Pennywise is coming out of the projector and into the room with them
In the Neibolt street house  Richie, Bill, and Eddie see Betty begging for help at a doorway when she is suddenly pulled off screen
After Richie finds himself locked in the room full of clowns, Richie turns around and a clown doll is standing right behind him and he gets a scare

In a room full of clowns, Richie walks towards a coffin and opens it. The scene is quite suspenseful and we expect a jump scare upon the coffin being opened however the scare doesn’t occur until after Richie closes the lid and Pennywise jumps up from behind
Bill and Richie go through a door marked “not scary” and after a couple of seconds the light is turned on and we see Betty Ripson hanging by ropes
In perhaps the only truly unexpected jump scare, Beverly turns around to leave the bathroom after a confrontation with her father and is attacked by Pennywise who is standing behind her
Beverly notices a music box playing, the music stops and a second later we get a slight jump scare as a toy clown pops out of the box
Stan hears someone whispering his name, he shines the torch down the tunnel and sees Pennywise briefly appear at the opening
Stan looks around with a torch and there is a scare when the distorted woman from the painting rushes at Stan
Eddie slips into the water in a sewer tunnel and sees several floating corpses
There is a slight scare when Georgie’s motionless body suddenly starts to shake
Quinn listens against the wall and some sort of generator noise starts
During a quiet scene a car suddenly slams on its brakes and runs over a girl
Quinn looks around in her sleep and a face jumps at her
Elise jumps while lying in bed
While Quinn is resting, a hand grabs her from above
Elise follows dark footsteps onto the wall and looks up to see a demon
Quinn’s friend on skype notices someone in the room. Quinn glances around to see a figure behind the curtain
Quinn looks under the bed and is grabbed from above
Quinn is grabbed while lying on the ground
Quinn looks out the window and is grabbed by the demon
Elise approaches the back of a female who spreads her hair revealing her face
A dark clothed woman jumps at Elise
The camera spins around to reveal Quinn
Elise approaches a man sitting on a bed when she gets jumped by something
The red demon jumps out from behind Elise
A boy runs past the screen in the background after Christian asks Elise “What are you doing?”
The boy in the closet appears beside Christian who is hiding in bed
A loud noise as Elise turns a crank may startle some viewers
There is a loud bang as the generator shuts off
There is a bang and the generator springs back into life
The spirit of Elise’s father carrying his wife passes by in front of Elise as she approaches the end of the hallway
A door suddenly being opened may startle some viewers
Elise reaches out to touch the ghost woman in front of her, suddenly the woman appears right beside Elise and says “help her”
As Elise is about to blow the whistle the girl suddenly appears beside her and knocks her over
Specs slams the door into Ted and his gun discharges
During an interview at the station, Elise looks up and sees a ghostly woman standing beside the detective (this is probably the biggest scare in the film as it occurs in a non-scary scene)
Melissa lifts a sheet to reveal a hand which throws her across the room
After a tense scene, Elise opens the final suitcase and Key Face reaches out and grabs her
Key Face throws Elise across the room
Elise has a vision of the demon from the first film looking through a window into Dalton’s bedroom
Young Elise reaches into a wardrobe and is attacked by a mysterious presence
The scene abruptly changes to a close up of dead Elise
Renai trips over a babies toy which begins to make noise
A kids toy suddenly turns on
Lorraine opens the bathroom door to reveal Josh
A mysterious lady appears standing behind Lorraine and Dalton
A singing lady appears in the living room
The kids high chair and toy suddenly go flying through the air
The mysterious lady appears suddenly, yells “Don’t you dare”, and slaps Renai. [Video]
Several images flash on the screen in quick succession as Carl senses something. [Video]
While in a hospital bed, Parker suddenly grabs young Josh
Renai suddenly wakes from a nightmare
Kids suddenly run out of the bedroom
A lady runs out of Dalton’s closet
Numerous apparitions appear beside Dalton’s bed. [Video]
The scene suddenly cuts to Josh yelling for help in “the further”
An old man suddenly appears in front of Josh chanting “he’s got your baby”. [Video]
A man appears in the window of the babies room

A man’s voice suddenly distorts
A woman suddenly appears in a closet

As the hospitalized little girl looks through her window again, the ghostly boy appears again (yet this time on the balcony of the other house

As a mother and daughter talk to each other, a ghostly woman suddenly rushes over to the door
After a flashback scene plays, the man suddenly transitions back to the present
As the elevator door opens, it reveals many versions of the ghostly boy inside of it

Esther turns the lights on and off several times seeing the silhouette of a woman in the darkness each time. As Ether turns the lights off once more, the silhouette of the woman suddenly appears much closer to Esther than previous times
As the lights turn back on, the figure appears standing behind Paul

movies.title: The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It

jump_scares.spoiler: There is banging on the door

David charges forward with a knife

The chainsaw starts up again in Arne’s hand
The demon Bruno charges out of the shadows

The little boy laughs and runs past Lorraine
